languages.text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, пока на ней не появляется набор загадочных символов — будто бы невидимый палец выдавливает их один за другим на черной поверхности. Вы не знаете что они означают, но от одного лишь их вида у вас начинает раскалываться голова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, пока на ней не появляется набор загадочных символов — будто бы невидимый палец выдавливает их один за другим на черной поверхности. Вы не знаете что они означают, но от одного лишь их вида у вас начинает раскалываться голова.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, пока на ней не появляется набор загадочных символов — будто бы невидимый палец выдавливает их один за другим на черной поверхности. Вы не знаете что они означают, но от одного лишь их вида у вас начинает раскалываться голова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if pressed into its black surface by an invisible finger, one at a time. You don't know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if pressed into its black surface by an invisible finger, one at a time. You don't know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You don't know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You don't know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de símbolos misteriosos aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. No sabes lo que significan, pero solo con verlos ya te duele la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de símbolos misteriosos aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. No sabes lo que significan, pero solo con verlos ya te duele la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de mystérieux symboles apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Vous ne savez pas ce qu'ils signifient, mais leur seule vue vous donne mal à la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de mystérieux symboles apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Vous ne savez pas ce qu'ils signifient, mais leur seule vue vous donne mal à la tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の不思議なシンボルが、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたように黒い表面に現れる。その意味は分からないが、一目見ただけで割れるような頭痛が走った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の不思議なシンボルが、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたように黒い表面に現れる。その意味は分からないが、一目見ただけで割れるような頭痛が走った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组神秘的符号浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。虽然你不知道这些符号代表什么意思，但仅仅是看到这些符号，就让你头痛欲裂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组神秘的符号浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。虽然你不知道这些符号代表什么意思，但仅仅是看到这些符号，就让你头痛欲裂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe mysteriöser Symbole erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Du weißt nicht, was sie bedeuten, doch von ihrem bloßen Anblick bekommst du stechende Kopfschmerzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe mysteriöser Symbole erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Du weißt nicht, was sie bedeuten, doch von ihrem bloßen Anblick bekommst du stechende Kopfschmerzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa tabakanın obsidiyen pürüzsüzlüğü, dalgalanmaya ve titremeye başlıyor. Üzerinde bir dizi gizemli sembol oluşuyor. Sanki görünmez bir parmak, siyah yüzeyde iz bırakıyor. Ne anlama geldiklerini bilmiyorsun ama onları görmek bile başını ağrıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. You do not know what they mean, but the mere sight of them gives you a splitting headache.{/n}
